name: CivClicker
storyline: You are the creator of your own society. You begin the game by naming it and naming the ruler of your society. The game progresses through clicking basic resources, which, after gathering, can be spent in a variety of ways. The na e of the game is to make the society as self-sufficient as possible. Assign villagers to do different types of work and the society will run itself. When enough resources have been gathered and you've upgraded your society sufficiently, you can start larger projects like building an army to conquer other settlements to expand your available land. As the game continues, you can begin to worship a deity of your choosing, and start working on the game's final objective, the construction of the Wonder.
summary: A civilization builder right in your browser. Click to gather basic resources, create villagers, and put them to work to build your empire.
